English: lit. in the eyes of a lover appears `西施~[Xi1 shi1] (idiom); fig. beauty is in the eye of the beholder

h.b: ㄑㄧㄥˊ　ㄖㄣˊ　ㄧㄢˇ　ㄌㄧˇ　ㄔㄨ　ㄒㄧ　ㄕ

q: 《`二十年目睹之怪現狀~．`第~`八~`十~`七~`回~》：「`其實~`他~`沒有~`大不了~`的~`姿色~，`我~`看~`也~`不過~『`情人眼裡出西施~』`罷了~。」

h.p: qíng rén yǎn lǐ chū xī shī

English: lit. in the eyes of a lover appears `西施~[Xi1 shi1] (idiom); fig. beauty is in the eye of the beholder
